description:
While Goku is busy fighting Ribrianne, Gohan faces a fighter from the 2nd Universe, and Frieza’s loyalty to the 7th Universe comes into question. What could Frieza possibly be planning?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Freezer und Frost! – In Boshaftigkeit verbunden!
フリーザとフロスト! 交わる悪意!?
